description: Donald Trump and his wife, Marla Maples, begin divorce proceedings three months after announcing that they were separating (S)
title: Divorce Begins For the Trumps
title_page: Divorce Begins For the Trumps - The New York Times
maintext:
Donald Trump and his wife, Marla Maples, have begun divorce proceedings, three months after announcing that they were separating, Mr. Trump said yesterday in a statement.
The six-line statement, issued by Mr. Trump through his lawyers, Jay Goldberg and Stanford Lotwin, said he had begun proceedings to dissolve the marriage.
The statement also said it was Mr. Trump's wish that he and his wife have ''a postmarital amicable relationship in which they will continue to act as co-parents of their daughter, Tiffany.'' Their daughter is 4 years old.
The couple announced on May 2 that they were breaking up. At the time, neither Mr. Trump, 50, nor Ms. Maples, 31, would say divorce was certain.
